attributes.action: PARENTS SHOULD SEE THE SEX OFFENDERS LIST
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
parents should have the right to know if a sex offender is living near them. their children should be allowed to play out with out the parent being afraid for their safety.
sex offenders should not be placed around children. the goverment thinks, that putting a sex offewnder around children will cure them, but they'll never change, if your straight, your attracted to the oppisite sex, gay like the same sex and so on. a sex offender is NOT going to change. They go on about their rights, what about our rights? our childrens rights? this is wrong, parents need to know if these people are around our kids. sex offenders should NOT have rights, they only right they should have, its to rot in jail...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
